backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the UI button visibility enhancement feature, listing affected files, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose, covering components, hooks, styles, and configuration for the Blue Bird Village game.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the Press Start 2P pixel font from Google Fonts and mounts the React app root for Blue Bird Village.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the full-screen Village3DScene as the sole UI element.
Animates a voxel chicken that wanders the terrain with leg-swing and head-bob animations, pausing and changing direction randomly.
frontend/src/components/animals/Cow.tsx: Renders an animated 3D cow using React Three Fiber box geometries, with autonomous wandering movement, boundary detection, and leg swing animation driven by useFrame.
frontend/src/components/animals/Pig.tsx: Renders an animated 3D pig using React Three Fiber box geometries, with the same autonomous wandering, boundary detection, and leg animation pattern as the Cow component.
frontend/src/components/BlockHotbar.tsx: Fixed bottom-center hotbar UI component displaying five selectable block types with Minecraft-styled bevel borders, keyboard shortcuts (1â€“5), and a highlighted selected state.
frontend/src/components/BlueBird.tsx: Controllable player character component implementing movement, jumping, gravity, and wing animation by merging keyboard and touch joystick inputs each frame via useFrame.
frontend/src/components/FollowCamera.tsx: Third-person follow camera that smoothly lerps its position and look-at target behind and above the bird each frame.
frontend/src/components/GameHUD.tsx: Fixed overlay HUD displaying the game title, bird position coordinates, and a prominently styled mute/unmute music button with color-coded states.
frontend/src/components/House.tsx: Renders a Minecraft-style 3D house with a stone foundation, wooden walls, a two-tier roof, door, and windows using Three.js box geometries and loaded textures.
frontend/src/components/PlacedBlocks.tsx: Renders a list of player-placed blocks as individual mesh components, forwarding pointer-down events for interaction.
frontend/src/components/Sky.tsx: Renders a sky dome, a blocky sun with a glow ring, and several voxel-style cloud groups using Three.js basic materials.
frontend/src/components/Terrain.tsx: Generates a 32x32 grid of grass-dirt textured terrain blocks using a Three.js InstancedMesh for performance.
frontend/src/components/TouchControls.ts: Provides a virtual joystick and action buttons (jump, music toggle, hints) for touch-based movement input on mobile devices.
frontend/src/components/Tree.tsx: Renders a blocky Minecraft-style tree with a trunk and four layered leaf tiers using box geometries and Lambert materials.
frontend/src/components/Village3DScene.t: Composes the full 3D village scene including terrain, houses, trees, animals, a player-controlled bird, lighting, HUD, touch controls, and block placement.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudio.ts: Custom hook that generates a looping Minecraft-style ambient melody via the Web Audio API, exposing mute state and a toggle function.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlockPlacement.ts: Custom hook managing placed block state with add/remove logic, grid snapping, terrain clamping, and pointer event handlers for left-click breaking and right-click placement on block faces.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, identity persistence, and delegation validity checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useKeyboardControls.t: Custom hook that tracks WASD/arrow key and space bar state in a stable ref, updating synchronously on keydown/keyup events for use in animation loops without stale closures.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module indicating no backend queries are needed since all game state is local.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up a Minecraft-inspired pixel-art theme using Tailwind, the 'Press Start 2P' font, OKLCH CSS variables for a blocky color palette, and custom component classes like hud-panel, hud-button, mc-action-btn, and hotbar-slot.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for ICP authentication wrapping the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with Minecraft-inspired colors (mc-grass, mc-dirt, etc.) mapped to OKLCH CSS variables, pixel font families, pixel box-shadows, and accordion keyframe animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking version 13 of a Minecraft-style 3D voxel game with a blue bird character, listing existing features, known issues (bird movement controls not responding), and architectural notes.
